son, "that if you don't wish to let me go, I'll stay. But I know I am no use anywhere except in the army; I am not a diplomat or a govern- ment clerk. I don't know how to hide what I feel." As he spoke he kept glancing with the flirtatiousness of a handsome youth at S6nya and the young lady visitor. 
The little kitten, feasting her eyes on him, seemed ready at any moment to start her gam- bols again and display her kittenish nature.
